# isEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the entity is enabled in the scene, allowing observation of its state.

## Declaration

```swift
var isEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

For more information, see [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/Entity/isEnabled].
